page.title: 05INDUSTRY 1
page.content: There are four industrial sites in our area. The works on Rownhams lane is almost complete, and is going to be a film studio. The saw mill is called { {New Forest Thinnings Ltd.}The wood goes down the coal mines to provide stands for Hydraulic jacks. The equipment is two band saws one cross cut saw and one circular saw. The saw mill workers have just made the shed bigger because the other shed is too small. They have two kinds of machinery,one is an old broken digger and the other is a brand new one. Only three people work there.{BORDENS}is the biggest factory in North Baddesley. Borden chemicals was built in the winter of 1946/1947. The site is 35,000 square feet. The North Baddesley site is the headquarters of Borden (uk) Ltd.
